This Project involves development of new modules and tier integration with existing application, enhancement of the HMS application where we have Contracts from each state in US which claim for their expenses paid to hospitals from Insurance Providers on behalf of Patient who has valid insurance, in HMS they are called Contracts. We get data in the form of Flat Files which are Claims from various Carriers, we load them into our tables Remittances, Claims, Deposits. Remittances are matched off with Claims using Informatica Loads. 

Project: AR Maintenance (Jan’2016-2019)
Responsibilities: 
· Developed ETL programs using Informatica to implement the business requirements.
· Created shell scripts to fine tune the ETL flow of the Informatica workflows.
· Created complex mappings in PowerCenter Designer using Aggregate, Expression, Filter, and Sequence Generator, Update Strategy, Union, Lookup, Joiner, Source Qualifier and Stored procedure transformations.
· Extensively used ETL to Load data from Flat Files, RDBMS.
· Performance tuning was done at the functional level and map level. Used relational SQL wherever possible to minimize the data transfer over the network.
· Effectively used Informatica parameter files for defining mapping variables, workflow variables, FTP connections and relational connections.
· Developed connected and unconnected Lookup transformations to lookup the data from the source and target tables.
· Developed mappings/Reusable Objects/mapplets by using mapping designer, transformation developer and mapplet designer in Informatica PowerCenter.
· Designed workflows with many sessions with decision, assignment task, event wait, and event raise tasks, used Informatica scheduler to schedule jobs.
· Reviewed and analyzed functional requirements, mapping documents, problem solving and trouble shooting.
· Performed unit testing at various levels of the ETL and actively involved in team code reviews.
· Experience in implementation of partitioning (Round robin, Pass through, Hash, Database) in Informatica sessions.

Description: 
Denormalizing existing table on Production and migration of the data, Informatica loads were modified according to the changes in the new table. Basically the table dealing with the medical claims of the Patients was modified, which lead to the distribution of data, hence faster query execution.
Decrease in the redundant data.

Extensively used ETL to Load data from Flat Files, RDBMS

Created shell scripts to fine tune the ETL flow of the Informatica workflows
Developed ETL programs using Informatica to implement the business requirements
